{{See also|Category:Block textures}}
{{wip}}
{{Dynamic list|File names should '''not''' contain JEx BEx suffixes, as including the suffixes will prevent this page from being updated automatically}}
This page serves as a compact list of all unique [[block]] textures that exist in current released versions of ''Minecraft''. For an overview on when each texture was changed, see the appropriate [[History of textures]] subpages.

Original texture files for {{JE}} can be downloaded from https://mcasset.cloud/, and the entire default resource pack for {{BE}} can be downloaded from https://github.com/Mojang/bedrock-samples/releases.

<!--- ordered roughly approximation based on natural and related building blocks, followed by colored blocks, functional blocks, and redstone blocks--->
